questions.Q: To make sure headings are not sorted with a range of cells you wish to sort, you should

d. Only use the sort tool in the home ribbon to sort data

options.opt: a. all negative values will be made positive

c. cell references in the formula will be changed according to the position of the formula
d. the formula will only be copied to some cells
